channel.title: Suggestion : Snippet Section - [READ THIS]
channel.description:
Okay guys, it's been really annoying that the SNIPPET I posted in snippet section [b]4+ months ago[/b] wasn't added to the snippet section yet, even after I pm'd. I suggest Mopar to have a new section 'Snippets' section, so that out work which is not a tutorial and is a snippet can be seen and discussed. [b]Last updated date of the snippet thread:[/b]
Last Edit: January 13, 2011, 05:53:35 PM by deathschaos9 »
It's [b]annoying[/b] and the snippets won't let a person get the Rep++ it usually get's from tutorials. People should be appreciated with their work, whether it is a snippet or a tutorial. I feel that a [b]'Snippets' Section[/b] will do it. I also want to release my snippets put not on that [b]lazy thread[/b] anymore. So please support me and get Mopar-Scape a 'Snippet' section. [b]Support me by posting below saying 'I support.'[/b]. You can make [b]MoparScape[/b], [b]the best RS private servers discussion site[/b]. Supports: [quote="Nexus_"]I support, we do need this type of section.[/quote] [quote="Loveandpower"]Good idea Sagi, 100% support. <3 -Love[/quote] [quote="Andrew Ferguson"]I'm on board with this 100% and ill help out with anything you guys need. Section really needs to be revived.[/quote] [quote="Ix Soulcist xI"]Suppose I can support this idea since having a thread of snippets isn't the best idea as said above and suppose having a board for snippets wouldn't hurt. And IF this board is to be added, I believe we should delete the snippet thread and let the members start over, if not delete the thread. Then the moderators can move that thread to the newly founded board and go from there.[/quote] [quote="i code rsps"]The only people who say rep is pointless is people that have 200 rep. Don't get me wrong rep honestly means nothing.. Support.[/quote] [center][b][size=14pt]SUPPORT THIS![/size][/b][/center]

item.title: Suggestion : Snippet Section - [READ THIS]
item.dc:creator: @Sagi Sagi
item.description:
@Sagi wrote:

[quote=“Saphire`, post:20, topic:394357”]I don’t agree.

The tutorial section is already filled with junk, hardly any tutorial there has any effort put into it and now you’re asking for a snippet section? Where people will just copy and paste stupid things from their server just to higher their post count? I honestly don’t see the need for it, snippets will not change the private server evolution it will just cause more problems and more posts for the help section that is already filled with stupid questions.

The moderators already have their hands full with useless topics, I don’t think they will want any more. Moparisthebest should comment on this, hopefully won’t come to the conclusion of adding a snippet section (Previously suggested and was denied).[/quote]
We’re talking about a snippet section, there shouldn’t be a problem unless the haters on this thread spam on there

It’s worth a try, if something abnormal happened (which doesn’t happen in other sections) then I’d say remove the section.

@The No. of Spams it will cause, I’d recommend another section ‘Spam’ lol. Nah just jking

5 Supports now.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Suppose I can support this idea since having a thread of snippets isn’t the best idea as said above and suppose having a board for snippets wouldn’t hurt. And IF this board is to be added, I believe we should delete the snippet thread and let the members start over, if not delete the thread. Then the moderators can move that thread to the newly founded board and go from there.

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestion : Snippet Section - [READ THIS]
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:13, topic:394357”]I do believe this has been suggested before?

But the point is that snippets in general do not deserve their own topic, I think. Putting them into a different section wouldn’t make much difference, would it? However, if people followed some sort of convention in posting snippets, it would be trivial to write something that can generate a list of snippets for easier access (by convention, I mean like putting a descriptive subject or something). I do agree that having to go through every page of the post to find a snippet is not the best thing at the moment…[/quote]
I suggested this when I was a newer member, but what harm can it do adding a stupid section like this? All in all, there aren’t enough people going to these tutorial boards in the first place. But, it would help bring more traffic into the site.

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestion : Snippet Section - [READ THIS]
item.dc:creator: @Sagi Sagi
item.description:
@Sagi wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:10, topic:394357”][quote author=Sagi link=topic=491541.msg3594607#msg3594607 date=1304958346]

It would undoubtedly be filled with variations of the same code. For example, a “::copychar” command, with one post for delta, one for PI, one for allstar, etc.

This.

This:

A mod can combine the threads, if same code is posted for different bases

[/quote]

And they would eventually stop doing it because people would still post the same code for different bases is different posts, because NO ONE reads the rules.[/quote]

It applied for all other sections too…and I guess a snippet section is good enough to be added, because small snippets are very useful…let the section of snippets have multiple threads, but it’d probably keep the good snippets up. Worth a try?

Read full topic
